metadata.title: CVE-2023-52651 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: ath10k: fix NULL pointer dereference inath10k_wmi_tlv_op_pull_mgmt_tx_compl_ev()We should check whether the WMI_TLV_TAG_STRUCT_MGMT_TX_COMPL_EVENT tlv ispresent before accessing it, otherwise a null pointer deference error willoccur.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
